Elementallis has its own community on our Discord server, join us!
https://discord.gg/elementallis


About the Game

Amend your actions


The Elements have gone wild because of your actions and the world is now in danger. Embark on a journey to restore them all and conquer the dungeons where each Element resides. Solve puzzles, fight foes and find secrets using the Elements you've gathered.

Features

  • Fight in real time combat and defeat your foes using the Elements wisely to exploit their weaknesses.
  • Prove your worth in the 8 dungeons, full of puzzles, secrets, enemies and bosses.
  • Use the Elements to uncover previously inaccessible areas.
  • Discover the 8 different biomes and help its inhabitants.
  • Experience a story about growth and overcoming guilt.

data.short_description: Top-down action adventure with elemental magic gameplay. Guilt pushes you on a journey to restore the elements in a pre-apocalyptic world. Use and combine your elemental powers to fight and solve puzzles across the temples.
